name: Final Housing Fantasy
description:
Final Housing Fantasy is a satirical commentary on the player-owned housing system in one or more popular MMORPGs, expressed in game form.

Yes, the game takes up to 23 hours, 30 minutes to complete. There is a win and loss screen, it works.

I built the scenery with Flowscape, created the title and win/loss text with Krita, and made the game with Godot.

You can play the game in your browser above, or download a standalone executable for Windows below.
